Tracking Sample: {{selectedResult.code + selectedResult.example }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from '../services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent { query: string = ''; results: any[] = []; selectedResult: any = null; constructor(private dataService: DataService) {} search() { this.dataService.searchErrors(this.query).subscribe((data) => { this.results = data; this.selectedResult = null; // Clear previous selection }); } selectResult(result: any) { this.selectedResult = result; } }
